item.title: DLNA on RaspberryPi
item.description: I always wanted to setup a media server at home for the following reasons: Reduce redundancy — having multiple copies of media for different devices like phone, tablet, smart TV etc Ease of use — no need to copy files to and from devices to play media (mostly Pink Floyd and movies) One stop shop with transmission integration — download files on RaspberryPi and they appear on the media server The easiest solution was to turn my RaspberryPi into a DLNA server.
